job.title: Software Developer -Web Development
job.description: ltstronggtltugtOverviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are not just offering a job but a meaningful career Come join our passionate teamltbrgtltbrgtAs a Fortune 50 company we hire the best employees to serve our customers making us a leader in the insurance and financial services industry State Farm embraces diversity and inclusion to ensure a workforce that is engaged builds on the strengths and talents of all associates and creates a Good Neighbor cultureltbrgtltbrgtWe offer competitive benefits and pay with the potential for an annual financial award based on both individual and enterprise performance Our employees have an opportunity to participate in volunteer events within the community and engage in a learning culture We offer programs to assist with tuition reimbursement professional designations employee development wellness initiatives and moreltbrgtltbrgtVisit our Careers page for more information on our benefits locations and the process of joining the State Farm teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtWE NEED YOUltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtEnterprise Technology is searching for a Software Developer to join Business Lines Modernization product team where the focus is on owning and managing Activity and Agreement event messages that are triggered based on certain actions within policy transactionsltbrgtltbrgtThis is a remarkable opportunity for a passionate software development professional who has excellent technical and communication skills solution provider mindset and thrives when given new challengesltbrgtltbrgtThe individual will lead and drive quality software development by engaging in forward thinking detailed design discussions ampamp solutions influencing the use of best practices while leveraging continuous delivery frameworks The successful candidate will effectively collaborate with business and technology partners and across productsproduct suites at multiple levelsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat You Can ExpectltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtApplies an expert understanding of development tools processes applications programming languages and environments to assignmentsltligtltligtDesigns and develops fullstack applications using industryadopted languages and frameworksltligtltligtEnables solution modernization activities through design and developmentrelated work items and architectural engagementltligtltligtProvides highest level of support for problem and issue resolution and provides technical consultation and direction to business and product team membersltligtltligtMay act as a product ownerltligtltligtLeads strategic work across the product suite and utilizes application architecture to increase efficiency and effectiveness of complex issuesltligtltligtChampion and provide guidance with an innovative mind set to deliver product solutionsltligtltligtInfluences and provides direction on product development practices coding data and testing standards code reviews and software architectureltligtltligtConducts research and integrate industry best practices into processes and potential solutionsltligtltligtDrives coordinates and delegates work of other product team membersltligtltligtDrives required product testing practices and solutions to ensure product qualityltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtWe are looking for candidates who have the following experienceltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtWorking with Java C or C 25 yearsltligtltligtIn objectoriented programmingltligtltligtWith JavaScript GIT AWSltligtltligtWith API web service developmentltligtltligtWorking within Spring FrameworkltligtltligtWebservices RESTSOAP clientserver JMS database queries and optimization plugins workflowsltligtltligtSoftware delivery life cycle experience including performance acceptance testing production supportltligtltligtUnderstanding of CICD tools and practicesltligtltligtAbility to convey complex design and architectural concepts to nontechnical audiencesltligtltligtDemonstrated experience working across technical domainsplatformsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Qualifications But OptionalltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtGuidewire Integration frameworkltligtltligtGosu languageltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAdditional InformationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtIncumbency Period This position will have an 18month incumbency period beginning on the effective date of the position which must be met before the employee can post for any other lateral State Farm position Employees may be considered for leadership or Technology Engineer openings at any time and a promotional position within the same job structure ie ProfessionalTechnical or ParaprofessionalSupport after 6 months from the effective date of the position In these cases the remaining incumbency would be waived The incumbency period does not affect the atwill relationship between State Farm and the employee and does not create an employment contract nor contractual rightsltbrgtltbrgtApplicants are required to be eligible to lawfully work in the US immediately employer will not sponsor applicants for US work authorization eg H1B visa for this opportunityltbrgtltbrgtSFARMltbrgtltbrgtDSS
